content.rendered:
Directed by Vikas Bahl.

Written by Sanjeev Dutta.

Cast Hrithik Roshan(Anand Kumar). Mrunal Thakur(Supriya). Nandish Singh Sandhu(Pranav Kumar). Veerendra Saxena(Rajendra Kumar (Anand Kumar’s father) (as Virendra Saxena)). Sadhana Singh(Jayanti Kumar (Anand Kumar’s mother) (as Sadhana Singh Shahabadi)). Aditya Srivastav(Lallan Singh). Sanket Deshpande(Doctor). Pankaj Tripathi(Ram Singh (Education Minister)). Vaibhav Gupta(Vicky – Student). Ali Haji(Prada – Student). Rajesh Sharma(Bacchi (underworld Don)). Deepali Kumar(Student). Chittaranjan Giri(Cycle Rickshaw Driver). Ganesh Kumar(Police Inspector). Vijay Kumar(BHU Head Librarian). Amit Sadh(Raghunath Bharat). Susheel Sharma(Peon). Abhishek Kumar(Keshav (Super 30 student) (as Abhishek Kumar 1)). Abhishek Kumar(Brijesh (Super 30 student)). Samraut Soni(Goon). Abhishek Kumar Sharma(Ram Lal (Super 30 student)). Sharat Sonu(Minister’s Secretary). Manav Gohil(Purusotam). Ajay Kumar(Laxman (Super 30 student)). Amrit Raj(Suresh (Super 30 student)). Ashwni Kumar(Shambhu (Super 30 student)). Abhinay Raj Singh(Coaching Student #3). Aayush Kumar Shukla(Vinod (Super 30 student)). Deepali Gautam(Kusum (Super 30 student)). Karishma Sharma(Song…Paisa). Deepak Kumar Gupta(Niranjan (Super 30 student)). Ghanshyam Kumar(teenage Fugga Kumar (Super 30 student)). Ranimol Ta(Nurse 1 In The Blood Donation Camp). Gopi Kumar(Manohar (Super 30 student)). Krishna Kumar(Veer Babu (Super 30 student)). 

Language Hindi.

Producers Vivek b Agrawal. Tanvi Gandhi. Ghanteshwar T. Guru. Anurag Kashyap. Madhu Mantena Varma. Sajid Nadiadwala. Chaitally Parmar. Hrithik Roshan.

Production Film Poland Productions. HRX Film. Nadiadwala Grandson Entertainment.
